have u ever owned a ranch u wouldn't joke or make light about it. My sister owns a 400 acers farm they get up before sunrise when they had cows to milk . Were do u think the food u buy at the store comes ? Hard working ranchers and farmers who actually work harder idc what job u do right it not tougher then a rancher a farmer. If u think it ok to destroy a cvs pharmacy then u need help counseling. I do take offense to it . Ive been on tractors and it a tough job .

A pricey wedding isn't necessarily good or bad. Creating memories with family and friends can be proceeds. Maybe the motivation for the big budget affair is a factor.

Trump says and does anything to get attention. Anyone who studies this guy knows that this was his plan years ago and he even talked about how to dominate the media. So he is constantly in the news and the other candidates are forced to talk about him a lot...so it sucks the air out of their ability to get a reasonable share of airtime....and when they do get it often they are on the defense. It is absolutely brilliant strategy...his actual reality TV experience preped him nicely for this. Only this time it is NOT reality TV...it is the Presidency of the US...not a game...not """"Your Fired""""...or who gets """"Kicked off the Island"""".
How do you screw this up?

Wait--so everyone is freaking out and bashing Walmart because of a RUMOR? Are you serious right now? Are we in high school? Or has this actually become middle school? this is THE WORST bunch of cry babies I've ever seen. First of all- Walmart doesn't close a store because of a rumor (this is not responsible news reporting so lets make this news source know that). Second-- if that store is MAKING MONEY they also won't close a store. How many walmarts across this nation are dry and they still make money. (Let me answer that for you HUNDREDS.) So before you start bashing a retailer that brings more revenue and jobs than most other retailers in that community id say you are a bunch of ungrateful residence. Do your research and stop believing everything you read on the Internet. ðŸ„
